name: Die Before You Don't
description:
Die Before You Don't.

To Win you have to die by letting the bugs eat you. but theres a twist there are healers around you which are trying to heal you so that you don't die. you have to avoid the healers yellow bullets (yellow rectangles) whilst constantly letting the bugs eat you.

This Game is only a concept and isn't made to impress. It was made for the Gamemaker48 gamejam competition but i have used this oppurtunity as a learning experience and have learnt how to make "good music" and spent most of the time playing around with stuff. This is for sure not one of the best games i have ever made.

Everything in this game is made by Michael Debono.
